Functions

00100_TASizes
[Limitations]

Involved Components and their required Functionality More...

Functions

 TestCase_GC00130_LoadTA3_128k ()

Detailed Description

Involved Components and their required Functionality

  1. ClientLib
    1. Can connect to daemon
    2. Can reserve memory for connection
  2. McDriverDaemon
    1. Daemon running
    2. Daemon socket accessible by TLC
    3. mcOpenDevice()
  3. Trusted Application TlTestIntegrationTest
    1. 9 Trusted Applications copied to Android on Test device in registry as 0501000000000000000000000000000x.tlbin (x=0..8)

Meaning of this test group
Loading of trusted applications with different memory sizes. Checking memory size limitations for trusted application loading. Memory size is extended via MemLayoutGenerator and exactly scalable code and data segment extended Memory is checked concerning correct mapping data segments are completely checked with data test patterns code segments are completely checked with numbered functions and return values

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00130_LoadTA3_128k (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05010000000000000000000000000003
Pre Conditions:
Involved components running and functioning
Focus:
OPEN_TA_SESSION( trustlet3 ) -> load trustlet3 mcNotify(&sessionHandle) -> ping to trustlet3 mcWaitNotification(&sessionHandle, MC_INFINITE_TIMEOUT) -> wait for response
Test Steps:
Test trustlet3 loading, Size Data=64k Code=64k Good Case: Trusted Application answers with accept message to ping and correct memory testing result
Verification:
OPEN_TA_SESSION() returns MC_DRV_OK. mcWaitNotification() returns MC_DRV_OK. mcGetSessionErrorCode(&sessionHandle, &lastErr) -> Check that no additional error code is set.
Post Conditions:
mcCloseSession() returns MC_DRV_OK.
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
Yes
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
Yes
Quick Testcase:
No
Test ID:
